name: com.toolkid.unitytimer
description:
這是一個輕量級的計時器工具，可用於Unity遊戲中。提供了一個簡單的API，讓您可以創建計時器，設置持續時間，啟動和停止計時器，以及註冊計時器回調。它是建基於UniTask，使用C#7.0的async/await語法進行實現。

This is a simple timer tool that can be used in Unity games. It provides a simple API that allows you to create timers, set durations, start and stop timers, and register timer callbacks. It is based on Unity's UniTask library and implemented using C# 7.0's async/await syntax.

samples.description: Performs a simple stopwatch that can be used in Unity games.
